Name: FC_b33
Description: REQUIRES MORE ENEMY VARIANTS (MEV), DEA, AND NOGASSPITPRAET. FC, the harder version of ND created with CD2 in mind. b33: All Heartstone WaveSpawners spawn distance 20->30 m. Heartstone Shellbacks and Bulks moved to new 6th WaveSpawner that activates every 75 seconds and spawns 50 m away. Heartstone Bulks have a NoSpawnWithin of 30 m. Bulk NoSpawnWithin set to 25 m for Salvage. Heartstone Praetorian MaxSpawnCount 4->0. Heartstone Menace MaxSpawnCount 1->0. Heartstone Stalker MaxSpawnCount 4->2.

Messages.Message: First resupply costs 40 nitra, afterwards all resupplies cost 60. Good luck!
Mining gold in FC? You will be generously awarded with CONTENT.
